general_advisory: Farmers are advised to conduct harvesting, sowing, and spraying operations accordingly. They should also make provision to take care of crops and animals to protect them from cold. Additionally, farmers are encouraged to complete the sowing of Rabi crops and start nursery sowing of Summer Paddy where irrigation facilities are available.

advisory: There is expected rainfall in the upcoming days, so wait for harvesting operations.
Use 'Super Grain Bag' for safe storage of paddy/rice.
Regular monitoring against insect attack is advised.
Use Azadiractin or neem-based insecticide if attack observed.
Wait for irrigation and spraying operations due to expected rain.
Use straw as mulching material in vegetable crops.
Regular monitoring against Diamond back moth in cauliflower is advised.
Spray neem oil or Emamectin Benzoate after occurrence of rain if attack observed.
Protect animals from cold by using jute bags and straw as bedding material.
Provide clean drinking water to cattle and keep sheds clean.
Vaccination and deworming should be done to control diseases and worms.
Ensure proper ventilation in poultry houses.
Provide external heat source to keep the shed warm and dry.
Maintain suitable temperature for drinking water.
